reviews.review_msg: Takes 8-10 business days to respond to student inquiries. Seemed uninterested in helping students or doing any actual work. I would not recommend this class as a GPA booster especially when the writing is graded as if it's a 400 level class. And that is coming from a 4th year student who has experienced a 400 level writing course.

Professor Dielissen is a real gem. One of the best profs I've had at SFU, she's approachable and willing to help in any way you need. Dielissen made the course content interesting and the assignment criteria/grading is clear. All I can say is she's an amazing prof and I will be taking more courses with her before graduating! :)
